name: HOOP
description:
HOOP is a one touch playable basketball game which you never see any lightnings or fires around the hoop like any other games. It is simple and a classic. You can play at different places on the court and compete with your friends on the same device.

- 3 Different themes with 5 levels.
- 10 Different ball design.
- 3 Game Mod
- Fancy Graphics
- One - Touch Controls

Let's compete
